content: 1 st creating the corners and the 1 single_crochet in 7 st creating the edges 39 st 6cm width round 4 use colour d chain 1 single_crochet in all stitches fasten_off 39 st 7 5cm width back panel -repeat the foundation loop round 1 and round 2 instructions from the front panel section round 3 use colour d join yarn in one of the 32 st from round 2 **1 single_crochet in 7 st 3 single_crochet in next st** repeat pattern in ** a total of 3 times 1 single_crochet in 2 st chain 24 skip 3 st 1 single_crochet in 2 st 3sc in last st of the round join first and last st in the round with a slip_stitch do not fasten_off or change colours the piece should now be square with the 3 single_crochet in 1 st creating the corners and the 1 single_crochet in 7 st creating the edges the chain 24 creates the case strap 60 st 6cm width round 4 use colour d chain 1 single_crochet in all stitches do not fasten_off we will now join the front and back panels 60 st 7 5cm width assembly -overlay the front and back pieces so that the skip 3 st from round 3 of both pieces are on top of each other see photo 3 for guidance -join the front and back pieces using single_crochet in colour d only join around the 3 edges that don t have the skip 3 st gap this open edge is where the headphones will go in -fasten_off weave in ends turn the case inside-out so the single_crochet seam is on the inside -now you re ready to use the headphones case insert your headphones in the open side of the piece and close the piece by feeding the strap from the back panel into the skip 3 gap in the front panel enjoy
